Plot: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.
Title: A River Runs Through It
Actors: Craig Sheffer, Brad Pitt, Tom Skerritt, Brenda Blethyn
tomatoConsensus: Tasteful to a fault, this period drama combines a talented cast (including a young Brad Pitt) with some stately, beautifully filmed work from director Robert Redford.
